name: Super Diver Adventure
description:
Super Diver Adventure is a game where you have to dodge sharks. This game was created for the 25th GDL-January JAM. The theme was Breath! so, the player needs to obtain the oxygen tanks to breath under water.

Controls: Use arrows to move the diver.

Engine: Construct2

  • Assets:
  • Underwater Fantasy by ansimuz.com : (https://opengameart.org/content/underwater-fantasy)
  • 4 Chiptunes (Adventure) by SubspaceAudio (https://opengameart.org/content/4-chiptunes-adventure)
  • Scuba Diver by Fellowship Of the Game (https://opengameart.org/content/scuba-diver)
  • Free PSD Mobile Game GUI by ToonCharacters ( https://freepsdfiles.net/buttons/free-psd-mobile-game-gui )
